ಭಾರತದ ಪ್ರಥಮ ಪ್ರಧಾನಿ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

 ಜವಹರಲಾಲ ನೆಹರು

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:4996"},{"text":"

 ವಲ್ಲಭಬಾಯಿ ಪಟೇಲ್

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4997"},{"text":"

ಮೌಂಟ್ ಬ್ಯಾಟನ್ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:5012"},{"text":"

ಡಾ. ರಾಜೇಂದ್ರ ಪ್ರಸಾದ್
